moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 d6 3. d4 Nc6 4. d5 Nce7: This might not have been the best choice, but the Bishop appeared to be weak, with limited scope, and this was intended to trade it off.
moves.5... c6 6. dxc6 bxc6 7. Ba4 h6 8. Nc3 Be: Here it was intendted to open the KB file, possibly exploiting by using the white KB on be.
moves.11. h3 Nxe3 12. fxe3 g6: Im not sure what was intended here...this move weakens the rook pawn, and leaves the King nowhere to castle.
Unforced error, loses the Bishop.  Available was Bf6
moves.27. Rxd6 Rdb8: Necessary was Rxd6, to prevent the coming combination.
